properties.Address: Ground Floor Lobby of Office Tower at Core A, Cyberport 3, 100 Cyberport Road, Hong Kong

properties.Scope of Services: The Auto Post is equipped with a combo of iPostal Kiosk and iPostal Stations to provide self-service mail posting and collection services.
properties.服務範圍: 「自助郵務中心」備有「智郵寄」及「智郵站」，以提供自助投寄及領取郵件服務。
